text: satyaniṣēdhikaḷ narakattinumumpil pradarśippikkappeṭunna divasaṁ (avarēāṭ paṟayappeṭuṁ:) aihikajīvitattil niṅṅaḷuṭe nalla vastukkaḷellāṁ niṅṅaḷ pāḻākkikkaḷayukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷ avakeāṇṭ sukhamanubhavikkukayuṁ ceytu. atināl n'yāyaṁ kūṭāte niṅṅaḷ bhūmiyil ahambhāvaṁ naṭiccirunnatinṟe phalamāyuṁ niṅṅaḷ dhikkāraṁ kāṇiccirunnatinṟe phalamāyuṁ innu niṅṅaḷkk apamānakaramāya śikṣa pratiphalamāyi nalkappeṭunnu
